target: Okay, the postal code is: PE296FL. Can I assist with anything else?
context: <user> I have a hotel that I really want to stay at today. <system> Can you tell me the name of the hotel please and then we can talk about booking a room? <user> It is the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel <system> When will you be staying there? <user> I'm not sure. Do they have internet? <system> Yes, they have internet available. <user> What type of hotel is it? And what is the post code? <system> Its an expensive hotel.<user> Can I get the postcode please? <system>
